page.title: 12EDUCATION IN GLENLIVET
page.content: Glenlivet primary school caters for children between the ages of 5 and 12. It is a two teacher school and has between 25 and 30 pupils. In the past year the school has been modernised with a new gym hall, canteen and toilets built on. There are two classrooms and a resources room which houses the television, video-recorder and computer. As well as the two regular teachers, visiting teachers come to teach art, music, P.E. and home economics. There is also a visiting remedial teacher to help the slow learners. At the age of 12 the children travel by bus to High School at Aberlour for their Secondary education, having to leave home at 8am and returning at 4.30pm. The nearest college is at Elgin and there is a University at Aberdeen
